title: Altered by Lead
description: My life will never be the same, altered by lead, damaged but not broken.I’m becoming a new me.I won’t run any longer; this time, I’m the hunter instead of the prey.But it takes hard work, skill, and a bit of luck to catch a mob boss.I’m going to need all three to survive this.Especially when I’ve got five gorgeous a**holes for teachers—and occasional bedmates.The Blackbirch Company.The organization my new lovers work for, it’s just as dangerous as the criminals they’re paid to hunt.So why am I so desperate to become one of them?Either way, in their arms, I grow.I thrive.And I’ll become a force to be reckoned with.**ALTERED BY LEAD is Book Two in the UNDERCOVER SINNERS trilogy. This is a romantic suspense with unapologetic anti-heroes and is fully intended for a mature audience.**
author: C.M. Stunich
